title: Memory told of a 'Hairy Man' crossing Hwy. 27 north of Homestead
observed: As told to the Investigator by the witness: "I was driving south on Hwy 27 in Dade county. It was after 10:00pm, but before midnight. I saw a "hairy man" crawl from the water, stand up and walk across the road. He looked very human, in a distorted way, and was very large."
location_details: Highway 27 (Krome Ave) south of Tamiami Trail, but before Homestead.
